df-1stc
blocks.content: Define the class of all first-countable topologies. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Aug-2009.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-1stc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(c1stc, crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cuni(cv(s0)), wrex(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wa(wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com), wral(s3, cv(s0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s1), cuni(cin(cv(s2), cpw(cv(s3))))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-2ndc
blocks.content: Define the class of all second-countable topologies. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 17-Jan-2010.)

blocks.name: is1stc
blocks.content: The predicate "is a first-countable topology." This can be described as "every point has a countable local basis" - that is, every point has a countable collection of open sets containing it such that every open set containing the point has an open set from this collection as a subset. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Aug-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm is1stc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1stc), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, c1stc), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))))))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, c1stc, ctop, wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))))))))), wral(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), wrex(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))))))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))))))), wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))))))))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  rexeqbidv(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))))))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))))))))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))))), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))))))
  raleq(s2, cv(hs0), c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))))))
  df-1stc(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm is1stc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ 1stc ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ P(c0),(s1[≼]_om ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2)))))))))
  ⊣ c1 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ 1stc ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ P(c0),(s1[≼]_om ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2))))))))), d(s0, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, c1stc, ctop, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ P(c0),(s1[≼]_om ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2))))))), ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ hs0, ∃(s1 ∈ P(hs0),(s1[≼]_om ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2))))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, ⋃ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0, ∃(s1 ∈ P(hs0),(s1[≼]_om ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2)))))), ∃(s1 ∈ P(c0),(s1[≼]_om ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2)))))))
  syl6eqr(⋃ hs0, c1, ⋃ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  rexeqbidv(s1, P(hs0), P(c0), hs0 = c0, (s1[≼]_om ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2))))), (s1[≼]_om ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2))))))
  pweq(hs0, c0)
  anbi2d(hs0 = c0, s1[≼]_om, ∀(s2 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2)))), ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2)))))
  raleq(s2, hs0, c0, (s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2))))
  df-1stc(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ P(c0),(s1[≼]_om ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 → s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ⋂ P(s2))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: is1stc2
blocks.content: An equivalent way of saying "is a first-countable topology." (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Aug-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm is1stc2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1stc), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, c1stc), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))))))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))))))))))
  is1stc(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)
  anbi2i(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))))))))), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))))))
  ralbii(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))))))), wrex(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))))))
  rexbii(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))))))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))))
  anbi2i(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))))), wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))))
  ralbii(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))
  imbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)))), wex(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))))), wex(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2))))))
  exbii(s3, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))), wa(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))), wa(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wa(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))), wa(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(s3), cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))), wa(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s3), cpw(cv(s2)))))
  elin(cv(s3), cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s3), cpw(cv(s2))), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)))
  selpw(s3, cv(s2))
  an12(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2)))
  eluni(s3, cv(s0), cin(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2))))
  df-rex(s3, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s2))))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cin.s(s3, cv(s1), cpw(cv(s2)))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s3, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
}

blocks.name: 1stctop
blocks.content: A first-countable topology is a topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Aug-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1stctop(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1stc), wcel(c0, ctop))
} = {
  simplbi(wcel(c0, c1stc), wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs1, cuni(c0), wrex(hs0, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wral(hs2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cuni(cin(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(hs2)))))))))))
  is1stc(hs1, hs0, hs2, c0, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 1stctop(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ 1stc → c0 ∈ Top)
} = {
  simplbi(c0 ∈ 1stc, c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs1 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∃(hs0 ∈ P(c0),(hs0[≼]_om ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c0,(hs1 ∈ hs2 → hs1 ∈ ⋃(hs0 ⋂ P(hs2))))))))
  is1stc(hs1, hs0, hs2, c0, ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(⋃ c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: 1stcclb
blocks.content: A property of points in a first-countable topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Aug-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1stcclb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1stc), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1stc), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1stc), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1stc), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1stc), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))), diffsc(s2, c2))
  mpan9(wcel(c0, c1stc), wcel(c1, c2), wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), wa(wcel(c1, cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)))))))), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, c1stc), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wral(s1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  is1stc2(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c0, c2)

blocks.name: 1stcfb
blocks.content: For any point ` A ` in a first-countable topology, there is a function ` f : NN --> J ` enumerating neighborhoods of ` A ` which is decreasing and forms a local base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: is2ndc
blocks.content: The property of being second-countable. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 17-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

thm is2ndc(setvar s0, class c0) {

thm is2ndc(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ 2ndc ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ TopBases,(s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` s0)= c0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ 2ndc, ∃(s0 ∈ TopBases,(s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` s0)= c0)), c0 ∈ { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ TopBases,(s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` s0)= hs0))})
  eleq2i(c0, c2ndc, { hs0 | ∃(s0 ∈ TopBases,(s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` s0)= hs0))})
  df-2ndc(hs0, s0)
  elab3(hs0, c0, ∃(s0 ∈ TopBases,(s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` s0)= hs0)), ∃(s0 ∈ TopBases,(s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` s0)= c0)))
  rexlimivw(s0, ctb, (s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` s0)= c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eqelr(c0, universe, (topGen ` s0), (s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` s0)= c0))
  simpr(s0[≼]_om, (topGen ` s0)= c0)
  fvex(ctg, s0)
  rexbidv(s0, ctb, hs0 = c0, (s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` s0)= hs0), (s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` s0)= c0))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c0, s0[≼]_om, (topGen ` s0)= hs0, (topGen ` s0)= c0)
  eqeq2(hs0, c0, (topGen ` s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ TopBases,(s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` s0)= c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: 2ndctop
blocks.content: A second-countable topology is a topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 17-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: 2ndci
blocks.content: A countable basis generates a second-countable topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

thm 2ndci(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctb), wbr(c0, cdom, com)), wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), c2ndc))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, ctb), wbr(c0, cdom, com)), wcel(cfv(ctg, c0), c2ndc), wrex(hs0, ctb, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctg, c0)))))
  syl12anc(wa(wcel(c0, ctb), wbr(c0, cdom, com)), wrex(hs0, ctb, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctg, c0)))), wcel(c0, ctb), wbr(c0, cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ctb), wbr(c0, cdom, com))
  simpr(wcel(c0, ctb), wbr(c0, cdom, com))
  eqidd(cfv(ctg, c0), wa(wcel(c0, ctb), wbr(c0, cdom, com)))
  rspcev(hs0, c0, ctb, wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctg, c0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctg, c0)), wbr(c0, cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, cdom, com)
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, ctg, cfv(ctg, c0))
  is2ndc(hs0, cfv(ctg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctb)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctg, c0))
}

thm 2ndci(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ TopBases ∧ c0[≼]_om)→(topGen ` c0)∈ 2ndc)
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ∈ TopBases ∧ c0[≼]_om), (topGen ` c0)∈ 2ndc, ∃(hs0 ∈ TopBases,(hs0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` hs0)=(topGen ` c0))))
  syl12anc((c0 ∈ TopBases ∧ c0[≼]_om), ∃(hs0 ∈ TopBases,(hs0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` hs0)=(topGen ` c0))), c0 ∈ TopBases, c0[≼]_om, (topGen ` c0)=(topGen ` c0))
  simpl(c0 ∈ TopBases, c0[≼]_om)
  simpr(c0 ∈ TopBases, c0[≼]_om)
  eqidd((topGen ` c0), (c0 ∈ TopBases ∧ c0[≼]_om))
  rspcev(hs0, c0, ctb, (c0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` c0)=(topGen ` c0)), (hs0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` hs0)=(topGen ` c0)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, hs0[≼]_om, (topGen ` hs0)=(topGen ` c0), c0[≼]_om, (topGen ` c0)=(topGen ` c0))
  breq1(hs0, c0, cdom, com)
  fveqeq2(hs0, c0, ctg, (topGen ` c0))
  is2ndc(hs0, (topGen ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctb)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` c0)=(topGen ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.c((topGen ` c0))
}

blocks.name: 2ndcsb
blocks.content: Having a countable subbase is a sufficient condition for second-countability. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 17-Jan-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

  fvex(ctg, s0)

  sylancr((s0[≼]_om ∧(topGen `(fi ` s0))= c0), ∃(hs0 ∈ TopBases,(hs0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` hs0)= c0)), (fi ` s0)∈ TopBases, ((fi ` s0)[≼]_om ∧(topGen `(fi ` s0))= c0))

blocks.name: 2ndcredom
blocks.content: A second-countable space has at most the cardinality of the continuum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2ndcredom(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c2ndc), wbr(c0, cdom, cr))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, c2ndc), wbr(c0, cdom, cr), wrex(hs0, ctb, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  is2ndc(hs0, c0)
  rexlimiv(hs0, ctb, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), c0)), wbr(c0, cdom, cr))
  expimpd(wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), c0), wbr(c0, cdom, cr))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), c0), wbr(c0, cdom, cr), wbr(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), cdom, cr))
  syl2an2r(wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wbr(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), cdom, cr), wbr(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), cdom, cpw(cv(hs0))), wbr(cpw(cv(hs0)), cdom, cr))
  tgdom(cv(hs0), ctb)
  sylancl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)), wbr(cpw(cv(hs0)), cdom, cr), wbr(cpw(cv(hs0)), cdom, cpw(cn)), wbr(cpw(cn), cen, cr))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)), wbr(cpw(cv(hs0)), cdom, cpw(cn)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, cn))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, cn), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wbr(com, cen, cn))
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com))
  ensymi(com, cn)
  nnenom()
  domentr(cv(hs0), com, cn)
  pwdom(cv(hs0), cn)
  ensymi(cpw(cn), cr)
  rpnnen()

thm 2ndcredom(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ 2ndc → c0[≼]ℝ)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 ∈ 2ndc, c0[≼]ℝ, ∃(hs0 ∈ TopBases,(hs0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` hs0)= c0)))
  is2ndc(hs0, c0)
  rexlimiv(hs0, ctb, (hs0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` hs0)= c0), c0[≼]ℝ)
  expimpd(hs0 ∈ TopBases, hs0[≼]_om, (topGen ` hs0)= c0, c0[≼]ℝ)
  syl5ibcom((hs0 ∈ TopBases ∧ hs0[≼]_om), (topGen ` hs0)= c0, c0[≼]ℝ, (topGen ` hs0)[≼]ℝ)
  syl2an2r(hs0 ∈ TopBases, hs0[≼]_om, (topGen ` hs0)[≼]ℝ, (topGen ` hs0)[≼]P(hs0), P(hs0)[≼]ℝ)
  tgdom(hs0, ctb)
  sylancl((hs0 ∈ TopBases ∧ hs0[≼]_om), P(hs0)[≼]ℝ, P(hs0)[≼]P(ℕ), P(ℕ)[≅]ℝ)
  syl((hs0 ∈ TopBases ∧ hs0[≼]_om), P(hs0)[≼]P(ℕ), hs0[≼]ℕ)
  sylancl((hs0 ∈ TopBases ∧ hs0[≼]_om), hs0[≼]ℕ, hs0[≼]_om, _om[≅]ℕ)
  simpr(hs0 ∈ TopBases, hs0[≼]_om)
  ensymi(com, cn)
  nnenom()
  domentr(hs0, com, cn)
  pwdom(hs0, cn)

  rpnnen()

  breq1((topGen ` hs0), c0, cdom, cr)

  diff.hs0.w(c0[≼]ℝ)
}

blocks.name: 2ndcrest
blocks.content: A subspace of a second-countable space is second-countable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2ndcrest(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c2ndc), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), c2ndc))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, c2ndc), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), c2ndc))
  syl5bi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, c2ndc), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), c2ndc), wrex(hs0, ctb, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  is2ndc(hs0, c0)
  rexlimdva(hs0, ctb, wcel(c1, c2), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), c2ndc))
  expimpd(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), c2ndc))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), c2ndc), wcel(co(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), crest, c1), c2ndc))
  eqeltrrd(co(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), crest, c1), c2ndc, cfv(ctg, co(cv(hs0), crest, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)), wceq(cfv(ctg, co(cv(hs0), crest, c1)), co(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), crest, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wcel(c1, c2))
  tgrest(cv(hs0), ctb, c1, c2)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)), wcel(cfv(ctg, co(cv(hs0), crest, c1)), c2ndc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, c1), ctb), wbr(co(cv(hs0), crest, c1), cdom, com))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, c1), ctb))
  restbas(cv(hs0), c1)
  eqbrtrd(co(cv(hs0), crest, c1), cdom, com, crn(cmpt(hs1, cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), crest, c1), crn(cmpt(hs1, cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wcel(c1, c2))
  simplr(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com))
  simpll(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com))
  restval(hs1, cv(hs0), ctb, c1, c2)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), ctb)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wbr(crn(cmpt(hs1, cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c1))), cdom, com))

  2ndci(co(cv(hs0), crest, c1))
  eleq1d(co(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), crest, c1), c2ndc, co(c0, crest, c1), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), c0))
  oveq1(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), c0, crest, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), c2ndc))

thm 2ndcrest(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ 2ndc ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0[|`t]c1)∈ 2ndc)
} = {
  impcom(c0 ∈ 2ndc, c1 ∈ c2, (c0[|`t]c1)∈ 2ndc)
  syl5bi(c1 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ 2ndc, (c0[|`t]c1)∈ 2ndc, ∃(hs0 ∈ TopBases,(hs0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` hs0)= c0)))
  is2ndc(hs0, c0)
  rexlimdva(hs0, ctb, c1 ∈ c2, (hs0[≼]_om ∧(topGen ` hs0)= c0), (c0[|`t]c1)∈ 2ndc)
  expimpd((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ TopBases), hs0[≼]_om, (topGen ` hs0)= c0, (c0[|`t]c1)∈ 2ndc)
  syl5ibcom(((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ TopBases)∧ hs0[≼]_om), (topGen ` hs0)= c0, (c0[|`t]c1)∈ 2ndc, ((topGen ` hs0)[|`t]c1)∈ 2ndc)
  eqeltrrd(((topGen ` hs0)[|`t]c1), c2ndc, (topGen `(hs0[|`t]c1)), ((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ TopBases)∧ hs0[≼]_om))
  syl2anc(((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ TopBases)∧ hs0[≼]_om), (topGen `(hs0[|`t]c1))=((topGen ` hs0)[|`t]c1), hs0 ∈ TopBases, c1 ∈ c2)
  tgrest(hs0, ctb, c1, c2)
  syl2anc(((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ TopBases)∧ hs0[≼]_om), (topGen `(hs0[|`t]c1))∈ 2ndc, (hs0[|`t]c1)∈ TopBases, (hs0[|`t]c1)[≼]_om)
  ad2antlr(c1 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ TopBases, hs0[≼]_om, (hs0[|`t]c1)∈ TopBases)
  restbas(hs0, c1)
  eqbrtrd((hs0[|`t]c1), cdom, com, ran((hs1 ∈ hs0 ↦(hs1 ⋂ c1))), ((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ TopBases)∧ hs0[≼]_om))
  syl2anc(((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ TopBases)∧ hs0[≼]_om), (hs0[|`t]c1)= ran((hs1 ∈ hs0 ↦(hs1 ⋂ c1))), hs0 ∈ TopBases, c1 ∈ c2)
  simplr(c1 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ TopBases, hs0[≼]_om)
  simpll(c1 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ TopBases, hs0[≼]_om)
  restval(hs1, hs0, ctb, c1, c2)
  adantl((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 ∈ TopBases), hs0[≼]_om, ran((hs1 ∈ hs0 ↦(hs1 ⋂ c1)))[≼]_om)
  1stcrestlem(hs1, hs0, (hs1 ⋂ c1))
  2ndci((hs0[|`t]c1))
  eleq1d(((topGen ` hs0)[|`t]c1), c2ndc, (c0[|`t]c1), (topGen ` hs0)= c0)
  oveq1((topGen ` hs0), c0, crest, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈ c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[|`t]c1)∈ 2ndc)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: 2ndcctbss

  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, copab(s1, s2, w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wrex(s4, c0, wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s4)), wss(cv(s4), cv(s2)))))))

  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)

  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(c1, c2ndc)), wrex(s0, ctb, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, cfv(ctg, cv(s0)))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(c1, c2ndc)), wrex(s0, ctb, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, cfv(ctg, cv(s0)))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(c1, c2ndc)), wrex(s0, ctb, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, cfv(ctg, cv(s0)))))), diffss(s0, s4))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(c1, c2ndc)), wrex(s0, ctb, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, cfv(ctg, cv(s0)))))), diffss(s3, s4))
  rexlimddv(s3, ctb, wa(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(c1, c2ndc)), wrex(s0, ctb, w3a(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wss(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, cfv(ctg, cv(s0))))), wa(wbr(cv(s3), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(s3)), c1)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, ctb), wcel(c1, c2ndc)), wrex(s3, ctb, wa(wbr(cv(s3), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(s3)), c1))), wcel(c1, c2ndc))

blocks.name: 2ndcdisj
blocks.content: Any disjoint family of open sets in a second-countable space is countable. (The sets are required to be nonempty because otherwise there could be many empty sets in the family.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.) (Revised by NM, 17-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: 2ndcdisj2
blocks.content: Any disjoint collection of open sets in a second-countable space is countable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.) (Revised by NM, 17-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2ndcdisj2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl3an3b(wcel(c0, c2ndc), wss(c1, c0), wal(s0, wrmo(s1, c1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wbr(c1, cdom, com), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  albii(s0, wrmo(s1, c1, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))

  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c2ndc), wss(c1, c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wbr(c1, cdom, com), wbr(c1, cdom, cun(csn(emptycls), c1)), wbr(cun(csn(emptycls), c1), cdom, com))
  mpisyl(w3a(wcel(c0, c2ndc), wss(c1, c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wbr(c1, cdom, cun(csn(emptycls), c1)), wcel(cun(csn(emptycls), c1), universe), wss(c1, cun(csn(emptycls), c1)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c2ndc), wss(c1, c0), wal(s0, wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cun(csn(emptycls), c1), universe), wbr(cun(csn(emptycls), c1), cdom, com))

  undif2(csn(emptycls), c1)

blocks.name: 2ndcomap
blocks.content: A surjective continuous open map maps second-countable spaces to second-countable spaces. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2ndcomap(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2ndc))

  -| wi(w0, wceq(crn(c3), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cima(c3, cv(s0)), c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {

blocks.name: 2ndcsep
blocks.content: A second-countable topology is separable, which is to say it contains a countable dense subset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: dis2ndc
blocks.content: A discrete space is second-countable iff it is countable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: 1stcelcls
blocks.content: A point belongs to the closure of a subset iff there is a sequence in the subset converging to it. Theorem 1.4-6(a) of [Kreyszig] p. 30. This proof uses countable choice ~ ax-cc . A space satisfying the conclusion of this theorem is called a sequential space, so the theorem can also be stated as "every first-countable space is a sequential space". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1stc), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cn, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(clm, c0), c3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1stc), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cn, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(clm, c0), c3))))

blocks.name: 1stccnp
blocks.content: A mapping is continuous at ` P ` in a first-countable space ` X ` iff it is sequentially continuous at ` P ` , meaning that the image under ` F ` of every sequence converging at ` P ` converges to ` F ( P ) ` . This proof uses ~ ax-cc , but only via ~ 1stcelcls , so it could be refactored into a proof that continuity and sequential continuity are the same in sequential spaces. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: 1stccn
blocks.content: A mapping ` X --> Y ` , where ` X ` is first-countable, is continuous iff it is sequentially continuous, meaning that for any sequence ` f ( n ) ` converging to ` x ` , its image under ` F ` converges to ` F ( x ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2015.)
